text: Yeemeneh yan maraw sinni Sadqhoota woh koh Abee kee Adah Amo Sinaamal tayxeereenimit mabaysina isi maalu Sinam yoobulah yeceeh Yallaa kee ellecaboh Ayró Nummayse waa Numih innah, too yoobulak ceelallo Burta Bagul- le xaxxaqah yan xaay kaxxa Rob elle Radey Burta kak duggu heey Saytuttucinuk cabeh inna, Tonnaah tama yoobulaleela Abba heen meqe taamoomit galtok tu- geyaanam maduudan Akeeral, Yalli koroositeh yan mara kayri gitâ fanah tirri mahaa
